messages.text: Hey there, I'm the assistant of the pharmacy. Who's there ?
Hello, it's Health Supply Express South.

Hello Health Supply Express South, great to hear from you! I'm calling to check in on your product offerings. Could you tell me what's new with your products at the moment, and have there been any recent changes to your pricing or delivery times that I should be aware of?
Yes, actually, we're going to change the price of the Doliprane 1000mg. It will go from €103 to €70, but the delivery time will be affected as it will go from 4 days to 7 days.

That's great news about the price reduction on Doliprane one thousand milligrams, that's a significant decrease from one hundred three euros down to seventy euros. However, I understand the delivery time will extend from four days to seven days due to this change. Can you tell me if this price adjustment applies to all quantities or specific order sizes, and when exactly will this new pricing and delivery timeline take effect?
No, sorry. I have to go. Goodbye.
No problem at all, thank you for the information about the Doliprane pricing and delivery changes. Feel free to reach out anytime you have updates. Goodbye!
